entry.title: SKY MIST SHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: SHIRT
Price: 5900.00

Description

Make a subtle yet powerful statement with the Sky Mist Shirt – a perfect blend of refined comfort and modern style.
Crafted from 80% terry cotton and 20% nylon, this sky blue shirt for men offers a breathable, lightweight feel that moves with you, whether you’re at work, out with friends, or traveling.

The tailored fit and smooth texture give the premium Sky Mist Shirt a polished edge, while the calming sky tone adds a fresh and versatile vibe to your wardrobe. Designed for ease of care, it comes with a machine reverse wash finish, ensuring long-lasting color and durability.

From smart-casual pairings to laid-back looks, the Sky Mist Shirt adapts effortlessly. This is more than just a shirt – it’s your everyday essential redefined with premium craftsmanship and timeless elegance.

Details

80% TERRY COTTON 

20% NYLON 

MACHINE REVERSE WASH

The split hem, button-up front, and subtle patchwork detailing bring texture and character to the clean design, making it a versatile piece for streetwear fashion. Its neutral tone pairs easily with denim, joggers, or layered looks, giving you endless styling options for every occasion.

A must-have for streetwear enthusiasts who value both style and quality.

Make a statement with the White Dragonfly Shirt – where refined design meets versatile style. Crafted from 100% cotton poplin, this lightweight piece offers all-day comfort with a crisp, premium feel. The bold digital print of dragonflies adds a striking edge, making it more than just a basic white shirt.

Designed as a white unisex shirt, it adapts effortlessly to different wardrobes—pair it with tailored pants for a sleek look or keep it casual with denim. Easy to care for with a machine reverse wash, it’s as practical as it is stylish.

With its clean lines, breathable fabric, and standout detailing, the white digital printed shirt is perfect for those who value modern streetwear with a touch of individuality. Whether on the go or dressing to impress, this shirt brings effortless confidence to your everyday rotation.

Vendor: Bluorng

Description

Own the spotlight with the Gold Digger Satin Shirt – bold, luxe, and made to turn heads.
Crafted from premium cupro satin, this relaxed-fit shirt feels as good as it looks. With a silky-smooth finish, camp collar, and short sleeves, it delivers an elevated streetwear vibe that’s both chill and statement-making.

The all-over digital print brings a high-fashion edge, while the button-up front keeps it effortlessly versatile – wear it open over a tee or solo for standout style.

Whether you're out for the night or styling it street, the Gold Digger Satin Shirt is your new go-to for luxury meets laid-back.
Premium fabric. Sleek silhouette. Streetwear attitude – all in one iconic shirt.
